name: Ball Bump
description:
There are 100 balls. Can you get them all?

Click to launch your ball, and click to make the moving balls explode. Time your clicks to get to the next ball (instructions intentionally vague!)

A minimalist game made for NotGDCJam 2019.  I didn't have much time but I wanted to join in the fun too.

You can replay the same randomly generated level, or try to play another randomly generated level.
